definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more

sentences.english: In April 1975, South Vietnam surrendered to the North and Vietnam was reunited.
sentences.chinese: 1975年4月，南越向北越投降，越南統一。

sentences.english: From the historical perspective, there is a staged meaning that the Nanyue Kingdom explored the Lingnan region.
sentences.chinese: 從歷史上看，南越王國對嶺南開發有着階段性的意義。

sentences.english: The Museum of the Western Han Dynasty Mausoleum of the Nanyue King is worth visiting.
sentences.chinese: 西漢南越王博物館值得看看。

sentences.english: Suntzu would have been impressed with general giap's spy network in South Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 武元甲在南越構築的情報網得到了孫子真傳。

sentences.english: It is performed by Zhang Yechuan, who has won the highest award of drama in China "Meihua(plum flower) Award".
sentences.chinese: 飾演南越王趙佗的則是張頁川是中國戲劇梅花獎得主。

sentences.english: Mausoleum of the Nanyue King is worth visiting.
sentences.chinese: 西漢南越王博物館值得看看。

sentences.english: In other words, this palace is the palace of South Vietnam in accordance with the construction of the Han.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，這座宮殿是南越國按照漢皇宮建造地。

sentences.english: Achieves finally the goal sinicizing the Nanyue's Minority Nationalities.
sentences.chinese: 最終達到漢化南越的目的。

sentences.english: The Tomb of Nanyue King is worth seeing.
Nanyue Kingdom was an important regional regime in Lingnan in late Qin and early Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 南越國是秦末漢初存在於嶺南地區的重要地方政權。

sentences.english: An honor guard of five former South Vietnamese servicemen marched smartly to the front of the room.
sentences.chinese: 五名前南越軍人組成的儀仗隊瀟灑地走到大廳前面。

sentences.english: By 1958, Communist-led guerrillas known as the Viet Cong had begun to battle the South Vietnamese government.
sentences.chinese: 1958年，越共遊擊隊即越共開始與南越政府開戰。

sentences.english: It's a protest against South Vietnamese leader Ngo Dinh Diem for his crack down on Buddhist.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個抗議南越的領袖吳廷琰爲他的打擊的佛教徒。

sentences.english: This time to conquer the Central Plains Dynasty is the first time dealing with the South Vietnamese people.
sentences.chinese: 這一次征服是中原王朝第一次與南越人交手。

sentences.english: There is a country called Jiande in the remote South Yue.
sentences.chinese: 在遙遠的南越，有一個國度名叫建德。
西漢南越王博物館值得看看。

definition: Baiyue, generic term for southern ethnic groups
former southernmost province of the Chinese Empire, now northern Vietnam
Democratic Republic of Vietnam (aka North Vietnam), a country in Southeast Asia 1945-1976
pinyin: Yue4 nan2 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: the state of Chu, one of the most important of the small states contending for power in China between 770 and 223 BC, located around present-day Hubei
Indochina (old term, esp. colonial period)/now written 中南半島|中南半岛[Zhong1 nan2 Ban4 dao3]
pinyin: Yin4 du4 zhi1 na4 Ban4 dao3
